news_header: Hassan Nasrallah's funeral is on February 23 in Beirut; Yemeni officials demand Huthi leaders' arrest if they attend.
news_original_title: Jemeniläisministeri vaatii Libanonia pidättämään Hizbollah-johtajan hautajaisiin osallistuvia huthijohtajia
news_text: The funeral of Hassan Nasrallah, former Hezbollah leader, is set for February 23 in Beirut. Yemeni Minister of Information calls for the arrest of Huthi leaders attending the funeral. The Huthi rebels, supported by Iran, have not officially confirmed their attendance, but reports indicate a Yemeni delegation may arrive. Nasrallah died in an Israeli bombing last September. Both Huthi rebels and Hezbollah attacked Israel during the Gaza war, affecting global trade through the Red Sea.
